meanings.definition: Of extremely poor or low quality.
meanings.sent1: The old, slummiest house on the street was falling apart.
meanings.sent2: The slummiest clothes were torn and faded from years of wear.
meanings.sent3: Even the slummiest toy in the box brought a smile to the child's face.
meanings.sent4: Her slummiest attempt at baking turned out to be a disaster.
meanings.sent5: The slummiest car in the lot barely made it down the road.

meanings.definition: In a very dirty or untidy condition.
meanings.sent1: The alley behind the restaurant was the slummiest place in town.
meanings.sent2: After playing outside, the kids came back with the slummiest shoes.
meanings.sent3: The slummiest corner of the room was always overlooked during cleaning.
meanings.sent4: The slummiest dog in the shelter wagged its tail happily at visitors.
meanings.sent5: The slummiest park bench was covered in graffiti and litter.
